text: Ko kashili okhuboolelakhwo amakhuwa kabalia baliho Imbeli wenyu? Abandu ba Nuhu nende Adi nende Thamud, nende balia betsa abo nibakharulaho, abulaho ubamanyile halali Nyasaye, Abarumwa babetsela nende ebifune bili habulafu. Nibara emikhono chiabu khuminwa mana nibaboola mbu; “Toto efwe khukhayile akamwarumwa nako. Ne efwe khuli nende inganakani ikhunyasinjia mukamukhulanjilangakhwo ako.”
